Question
========
What is an online portfolio in this course?

Answerlist
----------
* A private backup of your files stored on a hard drive
* An organized collection of work that showcases your skills and experience
* A list of websites you like to read
* A single resume file uploaded to GitHub

Solution
========
A portfolio is a curated collection of work that demonstrates skills and experience.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
